TextBlock.Text: MALLOW: My love, are all systems in the Launch Module ready?
AVENS: They are! All systems of the Orbital Probe Cannon are ready for <color=orange>the test today?</color>. Now, we may rest easy until the test begins.
AVENS: However, while I was undertaking the monotonous work of calibrating the systems, I thought of a mischievous idea that I must impress upon you, my love...
MALLOW: Oh, I wonder what ingenious practical joke you have devised now... Do not leave me suspended much further, my love!
AVENS: Nomai from the <color=orange>Sunless City</color> and <color=orange>Hanging City</color> will be visiting Giant's Deep to watch the test today - many of whom remain unfamiliar with the planet.
AVENS: Suppose the sunless tide happened to be visiting at the same time as our guests, by complete coincidence.. Imagine their confusion, arriving to find the islands submerged underwater!

MALLOW: Hm.. Though it sounds like a delightful way to surprise our friends, I fear I must raise some concerns: what if our visitors are unable to swim? This plot could be terribly endanger our friends!
MALLOW: Furthermore, there is also a chance that this plot could <color=orange>interefere with the Orbital Probe Cannon's function</color> during the test!
AVENS: Ah, I suppose you are right on both fronts, my love. You make sound arguments! I am glad my better 50 percent is always here to dissuade me from my own short-sightedness!
